attributes.action: Help protect the British Grand Prix
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year the British Grand Prix is faced with the axe because of its apparent lack of modern facilities.
We would like the government to help fund and protect this historic and well needed sport facility for future grand prix and to attract other racing series to Britain.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Help protect the British Grand Prix."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14892.asp

Prime Minister's Office
